ing: 1 teaspoon medium curry powder, or to taste
8 stalks celery, or as needed, cut into thirds
des: "I developed this recipe after wanting something different to serve with celery. First party I took it to it was a hit, and people were asking for the recipe. This is my new standard for an appetizer. Hope you enjoy!"
ins: Mix cream cheese, raisins, apple, curry powder, and lemon juice until smooth. Spread onto celery.
